title: Traktor Pro 2 v2.6.7 - OS X [packet-dada]
description:
TRAKTOR PRO 2 is the world-renowned, rock-solid 4-deck DJ software that gets you mixing straight out the box. Now with TRAKTOR 2 Technology Inside for enhanced ease-of-use, performance and creativity, this version boasts a new interface with TruWave colored waveforms for a visually rich experience of your music. Simpler than ever to use, TRAKTOR PRO 2 also sees the arrival of the new Sample Decks and Loop Recorder features for ultimate mix creativity.

Traktor Pro 2 Features
Professional DJ software with 4 decks and intuitive layout
Hi-res TruWave colored waveforms and easy-to-use interface with high contrast for club environments
Automatic beat detection and beat-gridding of music files plus intuitive syncing for perfect mixes
Brand-new Sample Decks and innovative Loop Recorder to edit and remix tracks live, plus included loop content make it easy to get into the mix
Over 30 studio-quality performance effects, including 4 new additions, all capable of syncing to track tempo
Advanced looping and cueing functions plus 8 assignable hot cues per track
Full-featured 4-channel software mixer with multiple EQ and filter options
Powerful track management with Crate Flick cover art browsing and full iTunesÃ‚Â® integration
Plug & play with all TRAKTOR controllers and audio interfaces, ships with mappings for all relevant DJ controllers
Record your mix using the integrated audio recorder
Traktor Pro 2 Specification


WhatÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s new:
Fixed an issue in version 2.6.6 that corrupts playlists containing Remix Sets or tracks when these are relocated
Fixed a bug in the search function that returns additional results not matching the query
Fix required the full deactivation of Metadata Sync with TRAKTOR DJ for this version

Please note:
We strongly recommend 2.6.6 users to update to this version to avoid potential data loss.
Version 2.6.6 has been withdrawn from Service Center and the Update Manager.
If you had 2.6.6 installed and update to 2.6.7, Traktor will copy & import the last Traktor folder (i.e. 2.6.6), so after installation please ensure you import your last working collection file manually (the procedure for which is outlined in the manual).


future-dada  MMXIV.
